lead_paragraph: The authorities have ordered at least two million paramilitary members into Tehran, re-arrested dissident activists and aggressively enforced public bans aimed at keeping youths off the streets.
snippet: The authorities have ordered at least two million paramilitary members into Tehran, re-arrested dissident activists and aggressively enforced public bans aimed at keeping youths off the streets.

headline.main: Iran Moves to Thwart Protests Ahead of Election Anniversary
headline.seo: Tehran Moves to Thwart Protests on Election Anniversary
headline.print_headline: Iran Moves to Thwart Protests on Election Anniversary
